product.name: Hotel Grand White Goose Down Fiber Comforter King Size - All Season Hotel Collection Duvet Insert King Medium Warmth Comforter with 1cm Breathable Panel 106" x 90"
product.description: ["Cloud-like Luxury Goose Down Fiber Comforter - Carefully selected high quality 75% white goose down fiber and 25% white goose feather fiber filling providing superior warmth lightness and comfort. The filling is hypoallergenic and has ADFC (American Down and Feather Council Certified) and OEKO-TEX certified ensuring its odorless eco-friendly and fluff up." "Breathable Panels Design - This goose down fiber duvet insert has a unique breathable panel construction that is lightweight and wicks away moisture. Say goodbye to stuffiness and dampness and enjoy a comfortable nights sleep." Ready-to-Use Goose Down Fiber Insert - Hotel Grand duvet insert comes with a vacuum pack please pat it gently to restore its original fluffiness before use. Alternatively let it air dry or low heat dry 10 minutes to regain its orginal fluffiness. We recommend using it with a duvet cover to maximize the life of your duvet. Corner Loops Design - This hotel comforter have 4 corner loops and 4 side tabs ensure it always in the correct position with the duvet cover. All our comforters feature self-piping stitching to enhance their durability and prevent the down from leaking. Storage Bag - The Hotel Grand duvet insert comes with a storage bag for storing to keep the down fiber comforter fluffy. It can also be used as a gift wrap to give it to friends and beloved ones providing them with stylish and warm bedding. "Warmth Choice - Customers can choose our duvet insert from three versions depending on their temperature preferences and current place of residence. The extra-warmth White Goose Down Fiber Comforter is suitable for winter or cold sleeper. If youre a hot sleeper or youre in the warmer months we recommend trying the light warmth/all season comforter."]
